folderDoesntExists: Folder "{{stepsFrom}}" doesn't exists. Thanks to correctily indicate the the file "bdd-generator.json".
tagCannotBeEmpty: Param "{{tag}}" cannot be an empty string.
fileSearchInFolder: Recherche des fichiers "{{files}}" dans le dossier "{{folder}}"
ignoredGeneration: tag "{{ignoreGenerationTag}}" has been found in "{{nbSkipped}}" file.s. Those files will be ignored at generation.
onlyGeneration: tag "{{onlyGenerationTag}}" has been found in "{{nbFiles}}" file.s. Only those files will be generated.
impossibleParse: Impossible to parse corectly in file
impossibleBind: Impossible to bind a step in file
noStepFound: No step definition have been found.
hookCallParameter: {{hookName}} call should have only one parameter
hookCallArrowFunction: {{hookName}} only parameter should be an arrow function
defineFileScopesImport: defineFileScopes should be imported from '@charlesgilles/bdd-generator' before any call
defineStepImport: defineStep should be imported from '@charlesgilles/bdd-generator' before any call
givenImport: given should be imported from '@charlesgilles/bdd-generator' before any call
whenImport: when should be imported from '@charlesgilles/bdd-generator' before any call
thenImport: then should be imported from '@charlesgilles/bdd-generator' before any call
onlyCallsInStepdefinitionFile: defineFileScopes and defineStep are the only function that can be call in this file.
defineStepThirdParam: Step callback must be a function or arrow function
defineStepThirdParamWrongIdentifier: Step callback must be defined in this file and not imported
defineFileScopesParam: first param of defineFileScopes should be an array of IScope
invalidScope: {{scope}} is not a valid scope [feature, scenario, tag] on line {{line}} column {{column}}
defineStepFirstParam: first param of defineStep call should be an array of 'given', 'when' or 'then'
defineStepSecondParam: Second param of defineStep call should be a string or a regex
defineStepScopesParam: Fourth param of defineStep can be an array of IScope
defineStepCall: defineStep call should have these parameters: blocks, match, callback, [scopes]
